snippet: Activist investor Bill Ackman once again denounced weight loss and nutritional supplements company Herbalife as a pyramid scheme, but Wall Street shrugged off his criticism and sent the company's stock soaring 25 percent Tuesday....

headline.print_headline: Ackman Goes After Herbalife's Nutrition Clubs
headline.main: Ackman Goes After Herbalife's Nutrition Clubs

lead_paragraph: Activist investor Bill Ackman once again denounced weight loss and nutritional supplements company Herbalife as a pyramid scheme, but Wall Street shrugged off his criticism and sent the company's stock soaring 25 percent Tuesday.
